titleStmt.title: Description of The order of service for musaf on the Day of Atonement.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 6277 A: The order of service for musaf on the Day of Atonement. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The order of service for musaf on the Day of Atonement.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script, punctuated, of the 18th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Musaf for the Day of Atonement. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Or. 6277A.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Dr L. Bolleli: purchased from him by the British Museum on 26 October 1901: inscribed, folio [36v].
